title: Realtime Gait Phase Prediction And Early Detection Of Gait Abnormality @ IIIT Kalyani
subtitle: 3rd Year Project IIIT Kalyani
description: Leveraged 91% accuracy in real time classification on predicted next gait step with r2 score over 0.91 and 0.57 using Convolutional Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) based Attention model on walking data recorded through a portable module engineered with MPU 6050 sensor, Bluetooth module and Arduino in a lab setting. Realtime prediction was done in order of microseconds. The ANN model for classification was pretrained on Gait Rec dataset and transfer learning was used for recorded data.

title: Gait Recognition using IMU sensor data
subtitle: Research Internship NIT Silchar
description: Achieved more than 99% Accuracy in building gait Recognition System using Accelerometer and Gyroscope Sensors and LSTM based Attention ensembled with tree classifier for user classification.

title: Crop Disease Classification
subtitle: Research Internship IGDTUW
description: Achieved more than 95% Accuracy in paddy crop disease classification

title: Precision Agriculture Using IOT
subtitle: 4th Year Project IIIT Kalyani
description: A noble circuit of IOT sensor was water reggulation and presion Agriculture recommendation
